markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Blitz](/Feats.aspx?ID=1954) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57)

**Prerequisites**
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1950)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two one-handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.

</column>

---

You attack as you dash among foes. Stride up to your Speed. At any point during this movement, you can Strike once with each of the two required weapons. These Strikes can be against the same or different targets, as you see fit.
name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
requirement: You are wielding two one-handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two one-handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.
